Details

Getting Here

For those flying in, there are two airports that are available.

Colorado Springs Airport
COS

  • Smaller and more quiet
  • All airlines except Southwest
  • Closest Airport to Wedding Venue

Denver International Airport
DIA

  • Larger and busier
  • Major hub for Southwest
  • More flight options but farther from venue

Where to Stay

We have a couple room blocks for anyone traveling from out of town at the Country Lodge.

Please note - rooms are only available through our room block for the following nights:
Friday, June 30
Saturday, July 1

If you would like to reserve one of the rooms blocked, please call the hotel directly and reference the McNutt-Berendt wedding.
